overview.en: Bondly (BONDLY) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Bondly has a current supply of 983,620,758 with 103,978,855 in circulation. The last known price of Bondly is 0.48113369 USD and is down -2.45 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 13 active market(s) with $5,265,630.96 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.bondly.finance/.
